reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well, with one noting it wraps around the body effectively, and they describe it as gorgeous and comfortable, with one mentioning it draws attention away from the bustline.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress for a good price.
items.body: Loved this dress! It fit me great and looked really good. It hugged my curves in the best way. Loved the green color too. Read more
items.author: Tabitha N Aikey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good cocktail dress
items.body: Was pleasantly surprised with how good this looked and fit. Great for a cocktail party. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely gorgeous and flattering
items.body: Absolutely gorgeous and flattering! I am a bigger gal with thick thighs, a butterfly, and belly. This dress was not only comfortable, but also flattered all the areas that make me self conscious. The material was lightweight and perfect for the outdoor wedding i attended. It was not see through. Length was also just right.i am 5'7" 250lb +, usually a 2x . Will wear again for any other special event. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Snug but cute
items.body: The sizing was a little snugger than other reviews suggested. Cute dress, though. Read more
items.author: Heather

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress for a night on the town for this thicc girl!
items.body: This was a fabulous dress I wore for my friend's bachelorette party for a whole night out on the town! I got a ton of compliments, and it was really comfortable. My measurements were quite a bit bigger than what this says, so I was pleased it fit and looked good! It was stretchy. I'm usually a 3-4 in Torrid sizes for reference. The material was thick enough, not showing anything underneath. It provided great curves. The color looked like a hunter green in person, and it was a good value for money. Read more
items.author: NZ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: I bought this dress almost a year ago. It stayed in my closet until this past weekend, when I decided to finally wear it to a wedding. When I first bought it, it felt more form-fitting and I decided to wear a different dress for the occasion I originally bought it for. However, I didn't want to return it lol When I wore it this weekend, I felt comfortable and confident. I received several compliments! I did wear a shapewear dress underneath, but I'm not sure I would've necessarily needed it lol This dress is comfortable and flattering. I bought a 3x because of sizing before. Could I size down now? Maybe. I do like to make sure everything is covered and I can move around without worrying if I'll moon anyone lol Read more
items.author: Stephanie S

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Envío erròneo
items.body: Me gustó la tela, pero no me enviaron el estilo que pedí. Ordene 4xl con mis medidas y ese estilo que enviaron resultó grande. Estaba muy entusiasmado por recibirlo y uffffff. Read more
items.author: Yania Bullard

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The material and size
items.body: Great fit, material nice and soft. Love the color Got compliments Read more
items.author: Brittany Varona

short_description:
Womens Dress Formal Cocktail Ruched Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress Formal Cocktail Ruched Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, 2. Long Sleeve, Burgundy, 1. Ruffle Sleeves, Red, 1. Ruffle Sleeves, Navy Blue, 1. Ruffle Sleeves, Green & Black Shapewear, 1. Ruffle Sleeves, Purple & Black Shapewear, 1. Ruffle Sleeves, Black & Black Shapewear, 1. Ruffle Sleeves, Royal Blue, 1. Ruffle Sleeves, Burgundy & Black Shapewear, 1. Ruffle Sleeves, Royal Blue & Black Shapewear, 2. Long Sleeve, Black, 1. Ruffle Sleeves, Burgundy, 1. Ruffle Sleeves, Black, 2. Long Sleeve, Burgundy & Black Shapewear. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
